ygData.subject: Re: When Titans collide
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron watches Switchblade fly away, he looks at Motormaster, then back at the disapearing robot. He will need to learn his place. Cyclonus, Decapitron, I

Subject: Re: When Titans collide
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron watches Switchblade fly away, he looks at Motormaster, then back
at the disapearing robot. "He will need to learn his place. Cyclonus,
Decapitron, I want you to chain up this prisoner in the hold, and then find
out the frequency to his bases radio, so we can make demands". He finishes
his sentence, then walks inside, "Speedbreaker, show me around" he
commands. Speedbreaker then shows him to the control room. Motormaster
hoists up Wildrider, "Okay guys, help  Astroblast out with this metal."
